title: J on Vacation!
author: verias
text:
So, J's off to Florida with the family, and here we have a bit more insight into the Triple Signpost, and the Hanged Man's state.

What've all you crazy peeps been up with in gaming lately? I've been mostly playing the newest module in Neverwinter, and working on getting more than one character to level 70.

See you guys on Thursday!

Keith W.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text:
Recently I've mostly been playing Discworld: Ankh-Morpork.
It's tons of fun.

replies.author: Lukkai*Guest*
replies.text: Mostly p&p actually. Edge of the Empire, Degenesis, Splittermond being the main culprits.

replies.author: Sario528*Guest*
replies.text: Ok, so I finally followed that link DaveB keeps posting, and now I'm hooked. Why do you guys have to be so good at this? No, really the comic is great.

replies.author: Musical_life*Guest*
replies.text: I've been grabbing some Square-enix deals here lately, 5, 6 and 9 to be exact. So far, 9 rocks!
